    • Uses of BindingMessageInfo in org.apache.cxf.ws.policy.attachment.wsdl11

      Methods in org.apache.cxf.ws.policy.attachment.wsdl11 with parameters of type BindingMessageInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.apache.neethi.Policy Wsdl11AttachmentPolicyProvider.getEffectivePolicy(BindingMessageInfo bmi, Message m)
      The effective policy for a specific WSDL message (input or output) is calculated in relation to a specific port, and includes the element policy of the wsdl:message element that defines the message's type merged with the element policy of the wsdl11:binding and wsdl11:portType message definitions that describe the message.

    • Uses of BindingMessageInfo in org.apache.cxf.wsdl11
